name: enigma-srcs
description: Enigma Framework for Node server aplications

scripts.publish-cli: cd packages/cli && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-core: cd packages/core && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-orm: cd packages/orm && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-http: cd packages/http && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-rsc: cd packages/rsc && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.install-all: npm run install-core && npm run install-orm && npm run install-http && npm run install-rsc && npm run install-cli
scripts.build-all: npm run build-core && npm run build-orm && npm run build-http && npm run build-rsc && npm run build-cli
scripts.pack-all: npm run pack-core && npm run pack-orm && npm run pack-http && npm run pack-rsc && npm run pack-cli
scripts.full-install: npm run install-all && npm run build-all && npm run pack-all

author: snakeful
